items.sentence: What\'s the name of the bar where Tom works?
Why didn\'t you come to the party yesterday?
You\'re the most important thing in my life.
It\'s OK to take a picture from the outside.
Tom picked up the knife and saw blood on it.
Tom rented an apartment near the university.
Tom said that he and his wife would be here.
It\'s a pity that you can\'t travel with us.
Tom keeps a change of clothes in his office.
Tom kissed Mary goodbye at the airport gate.
Tom knew about the surprise party all along.
Tom knew instantly that something was wrong.
I can\'t imagine what it must\'ve been like.
I can\'t imagine what you\'re going through.
Do you have a piece of paper I can write on?
Do you often need to remind Tom to do stuff?
I haven\'t talked about this in a long time.
Why did you decide to start studying French?
Why did you do it if you knew it was stupid?
Why did you turn down such a good job offer?
